CustomField.description:
The EDF staff person that manages the constiuent in their portfolio and is primarily responsible for the constituent's relationship with EDF. Works in collaboration with Relationship Managers.
All changes to PM post-launch are tracked in the Relationship Manager History object, and values from the Account PM are passed to any new Opportunities for that donor.
